TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyGroupDescription extends System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription

summary.span: 描述使用属性名作为条件对项进行分组。

span.span: Describes the grouping of items using a property name as the criteria.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图支持分组功能，这允许用户将集合视图中的集合分区为逻辑组。Views support the functionality of grouping, which allows the user to partition the collection in the collection view into logical groups. 这些组可以是显式的，由用户提供组列表；也可以是隐式的，这些组依据数据动态生成。The groups can be explicit, where the user supplies a list of groups, or implicit, where the groups are generated dynamically depending on the data. 允许您基于创建隐式组 。 allows you to create implicit groups based on a . 如果只想按属性分组，可以设置 属性。If you simply want to group by a property you can set the property. 如果要更改最终用于组的值，则可以使用 属性来提供值转换器。If you want to change the value that is eventually used for group you can use the property to supply a value converter. 例如，您可能希望基于名称的第一个字母对项进行分组。For example, you may want to group items based on the first letter of a name. 如果 未设置该属性，则将项本身传递到值转换器。If the property is not set, the item itself is passed to the value converter. 转换器可能会返回一个集合，该集合指示项可以出现在多个组中。The converter may return a collection, which indicates the items can appear in more than one group. 你还可以使用属性定义字符串比较应发生的方式 。You can also define how string comparison should take place using the property.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 获取或设置要应用于属性值或项以生成用于确定项所属组的最终值的转换器。

span.span: Gets or sets a converter to apply to the property value or the item to produce the final value that is used to determine which group(s) an item belongs to.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要更改最终用于组的值，则可以使用 属性来提供值转换器。If you want to change the value that is eventually used for group you can use the property to supply a value converter. 例如，您可能希望基于名称的第一个字母对项进行分组。For example, you may want to group items based on the first letter of a name. 如果 未设置该属性，则将项本身传递到值转换器。If the property is not set, the item itself is passed to the value converter. 转换器可能会返回一个集合，该集合指示项可以出现在多个组中。The converter may return a collection, which indicates the items can appear in more than one group.

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许您基于创建隐式组 。 allows you to create implicit groups based on a . 如果只想按属性分组，可以设置 属性。If you simply want to group by a property you can set the property. 如果要更改最终用于组的值，则可以使用 属性来提供值转换器。If you want to change the value that is eventually used for group you can use the property to supply a value converter. 例如，您可能希望基于名称的第一个字母对项进行分组。For example, you may want to group items based on the first letter of a name. 如果 未设置该属性，则将项本身传递到值转换器。If the property is not set, the item itself is passed to the value converter. 转换器可能会返回一个集合，该集合指示项可以出现在多个组中。The converter may return a collection, which indicates the items can appear in more than one group. 你还可以使用属性定义字符串比较应发生的方式 。You can also define how string comparison should take place using the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这会被忽略，除非比较中的两个值都是字符串。This is ignored unless both values in the comparison are strings.
